Package org.gerstner.oauth2android.exception

Exception Summary
InvalidClientException Thrown after the client fails to authenticate and the server returned an "invalid_client" error.
InvalidGrantException Thrown if the transmitted authorization grant was not recognized valid.
InvalidRequestException Thrown when the transmitted request was invalid due to a missing parameter, or it included a parameter or parameter value that was not supportet.
InvalidScopeException Thrown when the requested scope is invalid, unknown, malformed or exeeds the scope granted by the resource server

OAuth 2.0 exception - see the OAuth 2.0 specification for more details.
InvalidTokenTypeException Thrown when either the issued token from the server does not match the predefined or any known token type.
OAuthException Parent class for all OAuth 2.0 specific exceptions.
UnauthorizedClientException This Exception is thrown either, when the client fails to present a valid authorization to the server or if the server expects another type of authorization.
UnsupportedGrantTypeException Thrown when the client uses an unsupported type of authorization to the server.
